snippet: Adrienne Truscott’s new piece, “... Too Freedom ...,” explores work and busyness in its many forms.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews premiere of dance piece ...Too Freedom..., choreographed and performed by Adrienne Truscott at the Kitchen.
lead_paragraph: Adrienne Truscott’s new piece, “... Too Freedom ...,” explores work and busyness in its many forms.

headline.seo: Adrienne Truscott’s ‘ Too Freedom ’ at the Kitchen
headline.main: Ennobling Many Forms of Work and Creation
headline.print_headline: Ennobling Many Forms Of Work And Creation
